idea-plugin.change-notes: Fixed plugin page buttons colors. Updated theme colors for debugger, selections & static/nonstatic methods
idea-plugin.name: Hiberbee theme
idea-plugin.description: Monokai Pro & MacOS Mojave inspired color themes, with bright colors & dark mode, with common color code for all languages. See description & screenshots on Github Check the sources, iTerm2 and macOS Terminal and XCode color schemes also available
